channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Approximation by zero-free continuous maps
item.description: arXiv:2508.05931v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We prove that if E a subset of an n-dimensional manifold, then every continuous R^n-valued map on E that is zero-free on the interior of E can be approximated in the fine topology, and hence, in particular, in the uniform topology, by a continuous R^n-valued map that is zero-free on all of E.
item.dc:creator: Alexander J. Izzo
